title: [Self-directed] Web-based Training Program for Cultivating Inflammatory Bowel Disease Nursing Specialists

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing knowledge and experience in chronic disease management
context.additional_context: Parallel implementation of self-directed learning using digital devices and collaborative PBL (Project-Based Learning)

learning_goals: Learners can explain the pathophysiological characteristics and clinical symptoms of IBD patients with 90% accuracy
Learners successfully develop personalized nursing intervention plans for IBD patients through PBL team activities with over 80% success rate
Learners achieve a 20% or greater score improvement in pre-post knowledge assessments after completing e-learning modules

resources: IBD (Inflammatory Bowel Disease) Clinical Case Database

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
